meanings.definition: A thick cushion used as a footstool or for kneeling.
meanings.sent1: I rested my feet on the hassocks after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the coffee table, each with their feet on a hassocks.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the hassocks for a bed and curled up on it.
meanings.sent4: The hassocks felt like fluffy clouds under my tired feet.
meanings.sent5: The hassocks were so soft that I almost fell asleep on them.

meanings.definition: A clump of grass or vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed near the hassocks of tall grass.
meanings.sent2: The hikers had to navigate through the hassocks of bushes on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy jumped in and out of the hassocks of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The hassocks of greenery swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The hassocks of wildflowers painted the meadow in vibrant colors.
